Last nite i watched a urlLink show on VH1. In it Trey from urlLink Phish (one of my favourite bands, and Dave Mathews (who needs no introduction) visit Africa to play with Orchestra Baobabs. I always thought Baobabs refered to the trees on urlLink ">The Little Prince . I guess it's also a urlLink http://www.alovelyworld.com/webseneg/htmgb/sen47.htm">tree in Africa. To my surprise, the music of Orchestra Baobabs sounds very much like that of the "trios" in Puerto Rico. Their style when they sing, the guitars, the harmonies and melodies...everything ! it was like listening to one of my stepdad's CD's but in French.
